name: Canadian Cattlemen's Association
bossPosition: Director of Government and International Relations
goal: The Canadian Cattlemen's Association (CCA) structure represents every phase of the production system; the purebred, cow/calf, backgrounding and feedlot sectors. Our association was founded by producers and is led by a producer-elected board of directors from across Canada.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Keeping current and involved in CETA activities both at home and abroad.
